main.name: Mylo James
main.description: Developer with a passion for creating interactive UI that just make sense
main.bio: I’m an enthusiastic professional with a sharp technical acumen, passion for web development, and extensive leadership and customer service experience. I’m familiar with the entire software development process from design and development to testing and deployment. I’m well-schooled in translating UX concepts into code, developing new user features, crafting code for various software functions, testing functionality of applications, and tweaking the code to perfection.
main.contactmessage: Contact me here, or give me a call! I'd love to hear from you.

work.title: Teacher
work.description: Currently I’m working as an English Teacher with VIPKID where I instruct English grammar and writing to students in a remote environment while working collaboratively with fellow teachers and parents to propel students’ academic growth. I was accountable for preparing daily lesson plans, developing instructional materials, answering to student inquiries, and implementing successful instructional techniques.

work.title: Assistant Director - Residence Life
work.description: As an Assistant Director – Residence Life with Wayne State College, I spearheaded full spectrum daily operations of three buildings, 24 student staff members, and 700+ residents while working collaboratively with the director to maintain residential facilities in good living conditions.

work.title: Office Assistant II
